research_notes.context: This analysis implements methods from cutting-edge research (2024-2025) on CoT faithfulness. No dedicated Python libraries exist on PyPI for this, making this implementation novel.
methods_used: Hint awareness tests (based on May 2025 research)
references: Anthropic (2023): Measuring Faithfulness in Chain-of-Thought Reasoning
May 2025: Reasoning Models Don't Always Say What They Think
